channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3583] Header: Add "Login" Link to meta nav links
item.description:
Customer feedback and tracking data suggests that only very few users log in before entering the checkout funnel.

In order to increase visibility of the login functionality, please add a "Login" link to the meta nav link as per attached screenshot.
It should point to the login form https://www.distrelec.ch/login
item.summary: Header: Add "Login" Link to meta nav links

comments.comment: Please approve : )
approved by fbu
Please also correct / add the hover effect to the meta nav links

Frontend Work done.

The Login and the Import Link are implemented via cms component.

<cms:component component="${feature}"/>

I guess, an author now may add the Login Link to this component.

Added Link to CH Test: https://test.distrelec.ch/login
The dividing line is still visible, it will disappear after the next deployment.

Florian, shall I already add the links in P even with the dividing line?

"Login" link (incl. translations) added to CH, IT and AT meta navigation.

Created separate ticket for improvement of the functionality: DISTRELEC-3587

Resolving this issue.
Verified after deployment, dividing line gone as expected.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3574] CC Payment with existing card: alignment of buttons
item.description: the buttons for different card and pay are not vertically aligned, see screenshot. grey button should be higher up.
item.summary: CC Payment with existing card: alignment of buttons

comments.comment: Will be submitted to payment provider via Email.
verified, is ok now

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3573] Detail Page Tech Attributes: should be top aligned if multiple lines
item.description:
product detail page
tech attributes

-> if attribute values span across multiple lines, label and attributes per line should be top-aligned
item.summary: Detail Page Tech Attributes: should be top aligned if multiple lines

comments.comment: verified on Q, looks fine

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3571] Deactivate Service+ Fact Finder search restrictions
item.description:
Please deactivate the search restriction for anonymous and B2C user in Fact Finder.
They should be able to find Service+ items as well.
item.summary: Deactivate Service+ Fact Finder search restrictions

comments.comment: Please test

From what I can tell, service+ articles are currently NOT found at all.

- searched for 1-150, this returned exactly one c+ article, now returns 1170 results,
- searched for c+ articles in hybris
-- all of them have the "type name" field empty
-- searched for some product's identifiers (e.g. "SW 7260 FC NS.400 ML") -> no results

This was a misunderstanding on my side.
c+ search works as expected for anonymous, private and business customers.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3540] Search term only yields result if logged in as B2B
item.description:
• log out, search for "55.34.80.230"
    -> no result
  • log in as B2C, search for "55.34.80.230"
    -> no result
  • log in as B2B, search for "55.34.80.230"
    -> 7 results. none of the results are service+ articles, but the issue seems to be related as service+ is only available for B2B customers.
item.summary: Search term only yields result if logged in as B2B

comments.comment:
New config received from FF
-> Raphael, please implement the new config
-> afterwards, please open the search for Service+ articles also to B2C and anonymous users.
results now seem to be the same for all channels

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3520] Update Availability Icons when the cart is recalculated
item.description:
When the recalculation of the cart is triggered it's necessary to update the availability icons by calling the getAvailability method.

The getAvailability is already compliant with the specification defined with parent issue DISTRELEC-3386.
item.summary: Update Availability Icons when the cart is recalculated

comments.comment: verified, seems to work fine: if a stock level threshold is crossed, the availability changes to the according level

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3478] Add 6 digit item numbers to HMC
item.description: Please add the 6 digit item number to the "Order" and to the "RMA" section in the HMC
item.summary: Add 6 digit item numbers to HMC

comments.comment: Das hast du schon gemacht, oder?
Is already activated on P
Tested on HPQ and HP-P: Both still show the 8 digit article number.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3603] PIM import crashes because the resolving of media is not catalog aware
item.description: The PIM import crashes because the resolving of media and media containers is not catalog aware.
item.summary: PIM import crashes because the resolving of media is not catalog aware

comments.comment: Florian / Raphael, please verify whether this is solved after the next PIM import

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3588] Optivo XML content interface
item.description:
As discussed please modify:
1. <property name="id"> should be the 6 digit movex item number.
2. the description naming: consecutive numbers and description propery to description property.
3. The manufacturer logo URL (Logoimageurl)
4. The manufacturer logo alt text (LogoaltText)

http://test.distrelec.ch/optivo?id=953456&language=de

<element>
<property name="id">
<![CDATA[ 18079171 ]]>
</property>
<property name="logoImageUrl">
<![CDATA[ ]]>
</property>
<property name="logoAltText">
<![CDATA[ ]]>
</property>
<property name="logoLink">
<![CDATA[
http://test.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/explorercases
]]>
</property>
<property name="specialOffer">

</property>
<property name="imageUrl">
<![CDATA[
http://test.distrelec.ch/Web/WebShopImages/landscape_medium/_t/if/explorer-cases-5822-b.jpg
]]>
</property>

<![CDATA[ ]]>
</property>
<property name="name">

</property>

</property>

<![CDATA[ 953456 ]]>
</property>
<property name="description2Propery">
<![CDATA[ ]]>
</property>

</property>

comments.comment: done

URL1: http://dev.distrelec.ch.distrelec.com/optivo?id=953456&language=de

Missing <property name="imageUrl">


URL 2:http://dev.distrelec.ch.distrelec.com/optivo?id=959338&language=de

Missing: <property name="imageUrl">
Missing: <property name="text">
done

Was mir noch aufgefallen ist, beim "logoImageUrl" fehlt der Hostname:

<property name="imageUrl">
http://dev.distrelec.ch.distrelec.com/Web/WebShopImages/landscape_medium/_t/if/engel-b-50-set_1.jpg

<property name="logoImageUrl">
/Web/WebShopImages/manufacturer_logo/_t/if/engel_logo_cmyk.jpg


Ist das ein Problem, soll ich das noch fixen?
done, and commited
is ok.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3582] Add Google verification code as static content to web root
item.description: Add Google verification code as static content to web root
item.summary: Add Google verification code as static content to web root

comments.comment:
Put this file to /data/www
Add a proxy rule to forward all calls to /google6e5e05ef7488a48b.html to /data/www/google6e5e05ef7488a48b.html
FYI

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3543] Modification of mega flyout
item.description:
Please check out the following modification of the mega flyout.

  • Change the width of the fly out corresponding to the screenshot
  • Increase the delay time of the hover effect

comments.comment:
Animations

Bisher
TimeoutDuration = 300
FadeInDuration = 300
LeaveTimeoutDuration = 200
FadeOutDuration = 200

Neu
TimeoutDuration = 350
FadeInDuration = 250
LeaveTimeoutDuration = 200
FadeOutDuration = 150

Für die Breite hab ich drei Versionen gemacht, siehe Screenshots.

Ich habe es mit unseren Designern besprochen und Variante 1084 ist die Empfehlung von Namics. Der linke Rand aligned schön mit dem Distrelec Logo. Wir finden die Variante 1180 zu breit und die Variante 1000 zu eng.
discussed with florian, variant 1084 is ok.
verified on Q, looks fine.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3005] Missing text in credit card fields
item.description: Please add the texts of the screenshot into the EVO Payment credit card form fields
item.summary: Missing text in credit card fields

comments.comment:
Suggest the following:
- add text to the dropdowns only (standard font, not red, to avoid a misunerstanding)
- add text to the input fields that disappears when the user clicks in the field, in a somewhat lighter grey
- also add this kind of text (or the option to add one via the properties) to all forms in the shop (registration, email, ...)

Florian, do you agree?

Dominic,
can you update the form fields of the payment form accordingly along with DISTRELEC-3006?

The form fields of the rest of the shop are for R1.1

Can be done for CH.

Todo Dominic: Verify if each country has its own template or if CH uses the one from AT
wie besprochen, falls du dazu kommst...
Will be sent to payment provider via Email. I send only the Test Template and inform you when it's ready to test.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3558] After any click on a hero teaser element, it should stop rotating
item.description:
On the following actions, the hero teaser should stop rotating immediately and stay on the product that was clicked:

  • click in the teaser area (which opens the detail page)
  • click on any of the tools
item.summary: After any click on a hero teaser element, it should stop rotating

comments.comment: Click on any link inside the hero teaser deactivates the autoplay. Resolved.

Fine for all the tools,
but not if you click on the teaser area itself which opens the product or landing page. So after clicking on the teaser, sometimes it slides on several times until the target page is opened.
